name: Verify Ship Control System
description: Validates that the ship control panel power button and screen interactions work correctly.
testObjective: Ensure ship control system components function properly and provide appropriate feedback.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in the ship cockpit

steps.action: Locate the red power button on the ship control panel
steps.expected: Power button is visible and shows interactable outline when approached

steps.action: Press E on the power button
steps.expected: Power activates, systems come online, audio/visual feedback occurs

steps.action: Interact with the left screen on the control panel
steps.expected: Screen view opens showing interface with numbers (e.g., 0, 7)

steps.action: Press right mouse button while in screen view
steps.expected: Screen view closes and returns to normal gameplay view

steps.action: Interact with other screens on the control panel
steps.expected: Each screen opens its respective interface correctly

postconditions: All screen interfaces are accessible and can be exited
